p.s: The PEAR::Net_Dig class should be a nice, friendly OO interface to the dig command
p.d:
See http://viebrock.ca/code/2/porting-netdig-to-netdns for information on using Net_DNS instead. *********
Net_Dig class is no longer being maintained. Use of Net_DNS is recommended instead. A brief tutorial on how to migrate to Net_DNS is listed below.
